patterns: How are overdue, lost, or damaged books handled?
What is the procedure for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What happens if a book is overdue, lost, or damaged?
How do you deal with books that are late, lost, or damaged?
What are the policies for overdue, lost, or damaged library materials?
What are the penalties for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What are the consequences if I return a book late, lose it, or damage it?
Are there fines or fees for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What's the library's process when a book isn't returned on time, is lost, or gets damaged?
What if my library book is late, lost, or I damage it?
Late, lost, or damaged books - what's the deal?
Could you explain how situations involving late returns, lost items, or book damage are resolved?
What steps are taken if a library book is overdue, goes missing, or is returned in poor condition?
What is the library's policy on overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What are the library's rules for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What are the library's policies regarding overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What are the library's guidelines for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
What are the library's procedures for overdue, lost, or damaged books?
responses: If books are returned past their due date, a fine will be incurred. If books are damaged, a fine will also be assessed based on the condition. In the event a book is lost, you will be required to pay its value or provide a new replacement copy. It's important to return books on time and in good condition.

There's a fine for overdue books. You'll also be fined for damaging books, with the amount depending on the condition. If a book is lost, you're expected to pay its value or get a new one for the library. It's important to return books on time and in good condition.

patterns: What is the maximum borrowing period for books?
How long can I borrow books for at most?
What's the longest I can keep a library book?
Is there a maximum loan period for books?
What is the maximum checkout duration for books?
How long is the maximum loan term for library books?
For how long can books be borrowed at maximum?
What's the library's policy on the maximum borrowing time for books?
Could you tell me the maximum time limit for borrowing books?
What is the upper limit for how long I can borrow books?
How long do I get to keep books I borrow?
Max borrow time for books?
Longest book loan period?
What's the furthest out a due date can be for a book?
How long can I have a book before I need to return it?
What is the maximum time I can borrow a book?
How long can I borrow a book for?
What is the maximum duration for borrowing books?
How long can I keep a book before returning it?
What is the maximum time allowed for borrowing books?
How long can I borrow a book from the library?
responses: The maximum borrowing period for textbooks is 3 months, while for other materials it is 1 month. You can renew a book for up to 10 days if it is not overdue.
For textbooks, the maximum loan duration is 3 months, and for other documents, it's 1 month. You can renew a book for up to 10 days if it is not overdue.

What is the maximum number of books I can borrow at the library?
How many books can I borrow from the library at most?
What is the maximum quantity of books I can borrow?
responses: The maximum quantity of textbooks is 7, while for other materials it is 5.
For textbooks, the maximum quantity is 7, and for other documents, it's 5.

patterns: What are the ways to contact if you have any problems or questions?

Tell me how to contact customer service.
What's the best way to get help quickly?
What are the contact options for questions?
responses: If you have any problems or questions, you can contact the library staff at the circulation desk or reach out via email at is@dut.udn.vn. You can also message directly via fanpage https://www.facebook.com/DUT.LibraryPage or call directly via phone number.
